Lilium Candidum Flower Extract, Bisabolol, Mica, Allantoin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Oil, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Seed Oil, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil
